verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%>, that when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%>, and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H3543>dim<s%>, so that he could not <S%H7200>see<s%>, he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>him<s%>, My son: and he said unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Behold, here am I.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold <S%H2204>now<s%>, I am old, I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H4194>death<s%>:

Now therefore <S%H5375>take<s%>, I pray you your <S%H3627>weapons<s%>, your <S%H8522>quiver<s%> and your <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H6679>take<s%> me some <S%H6718>venison<s%>;

And <S%H6213>make<s%> me savory <S%H4303>meat<s%>, such <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H398>me<s%>, that I may eat; that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>. And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for <S%H6718>venison<s%>, and to bring <S%H935>it<s%>.

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Behold<s%>, I heard your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H935>Bring<s%> me <S%H6718>venison<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> me savory <S%H4303>meat<s%>, that I may <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H4194>death<s%>.
Now <S%H1121>therefore<s%>, my son, <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to that <S%H834>which<s%> I command <S%H6680>you<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> now to the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> me from there <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1423>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>; and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them savory <S%H4303>meat<s%> for your <S%H1>father<s%>, such as he <S%H157>loves<s%>:
And you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to your <S%H1>father<s%>, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H834>that<s%> he may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>, <S%H6215>Behold<s%>, Esau my <S%H251>brother<s%> is a <S%H8163>hairy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and I am a <S%H2509>smooth<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>:

My <S%H1>father<s%> probably will <S%H4959>feel<s%> <S%H5869>me<s%>, and I shall seem to him as a <S%H8591>deceiver<s%>; and I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> upon <S%H1293>me<s%>, and not a blessing.

And his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7045>him<s%>, Upon me be your curse, my <S%H1121>son<s%>: only <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> fetch me <S%H3947>them<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to his <S%H517>mother<s%>: and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> savory <S%H4303>meat<s%>, such as his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%>.

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2532>good<s%> <S%H899>clothes<s%> of her <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, which were with her in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and put them <S%H3847>upon<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>:
And she <S%H3847>put<s%> the <S%H5785>skins<s%> of the <S%H1423>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> upon his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and upon the <S%H2513>smooth<s%> of his <S%H6677>neck<s%>:
And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> the savory <S%H4303>meat<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%>, which she had <S%H6213>prepared<s%>, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
And he <S%H935>came<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am <S%H1121>I<s%>; who are you my son?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, I am <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>; I have <S%H6213>done<s%> according as you <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H6965>me<s%>: arise, I pray you <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H6718>venison<s%>, that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> may bless <S%H1288>me<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1121>son<s%>, How is it that you have <S%H4672>found<s%> it so <S%H4116>quickly<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>brought<s%> it to <S%H6440>me<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Come <S%H5066>near<s%>, I pray you that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> you my <S%H1121>son<s%>, whether you be my <S%H2088>very<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> Esau or <S%H6215>not<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5066>near<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>; and he <S%H4959>felt<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, The <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice<s%>, but the <S%H3027>hands<s%> are the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>.
And he <S%H5234>discerned<s%> him <S%H3027>not<s%>, because his hands were <S%H8163>hairy<s%>, as his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands<s%>: so he blessed <S%H1288>him<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, are you my very <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Bring it <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H398>me<s%>, and I will eat of my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H6718>venison<s%>, that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you And he brought it <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H398>him<s%>, and he did eat: and he <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and he <S%H8354>drank<s%>.
And his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5066>him<s%>, Come near <S%H5401>now<s%>, and kiss <S%H1121>me<s%>, my son.

And he came <S%H5066>near<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7306>him<s%>: and he smelled the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, <S%H7200>See<s%>, the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> is as the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of a <S%H7704>field<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%>:

Therefore <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7230>plenty<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%>:

Let <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> you and <S%H3816>nations<s%> bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to you <S%H1933>be<s%> <S%H1376>lord<s%> over your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and let your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to you <S%H779>cursed<s%> be every one that <S%H779>curses<s%> you and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be he that blesses <S%H1288>you<s%>

And it came to <S%H3327>pass<s%>, as soon as Isaac had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1288>blessing<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H389>yet<s%> <S%H3318>scarce<s%> gone <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, that <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> from his <S%H6718>hunting<s%>.

And he also had <S%H6213>made<s%> savory <S%H4303>meat<s%>, and brought <S%H935>it<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, Let my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H6718>venison<s%>, that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> may bless <S%H1288>me<s%>.
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Who are you And he said, I am your <S%H1121>son<s%>, your <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> <S%H1419>very<s%> <S%H3966>violently<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H645>Who<s%>? Where is he that has <S%H6679>taken<s%> <S%H6718>venison<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H398>me<s%>, and I have eaten of all before you <S%H935>came<s%>, and have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H1288>him<s%>? Yes and he shall be blessed.

And when <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, he <S%H6817>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H1>me<s%>, even me also, O my father.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H4820>deceit<s%>, and has taken <S%H3947>away<s%> your <S%H1293>blessing<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Is not he <S%H3588>rightly<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>? for he has supplanted <S%H6117>me<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> two <S%H6471>times<s%>: he took <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1062>birthright<s%>; <S%H3947>and<s%>, behold, now he has taken away my <S%H1293>blessing<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, have you not <S%H680>reserved<s%> a blessing for <S%H1293>me<s%>?

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, <S%H7760>Behold<s%>, I have made him your <S%H1376>lord<s%>, and all his <S%H251>brothers<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to him for <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and with <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%> have I <S%H5564>sustained<s%> <S%H6213>him<s%>: and what shall I do <S%H645>now<s%> unto you my <S%H1121>son<s%>?

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, have you but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, my <S%H1>father<s%>? <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1>me<s%>, even me also, O my father. And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4186>him<s%>, Behold, your living shall be the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> from <S%H5920>above<s%>;

And by your <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall you <S%H2421>live<s%>, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>; and it shall come to pass when you shall have the <S%H7300>dominion<s%>, that you shall <S%H6561>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from off your <S%H6677>neck<s%>.

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7852>hated<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> blessed <S%H1288>him<s%>: and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> for my <S%H1>father<s%> are at <S%H7126>hand<s%>; then will I <S%H2026>kill<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And these <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> were <S%H5046>told<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>: and she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H251>him<s%>, Behold, your brother <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, as touching you does <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H2026>himself<s%>, purposing to kill you
Now <S%H1121>therefore<s%>, my son, <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H1272>flee<s%> you to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H2771>Haran<s%>;
And <S%H3427>stay<s%> with him a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H834>until<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H2534>fury<s%> turn <S%H7725>away<s%>;

Until your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from you and he <S%H7911>forget<s%> that which you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7971>him<s%>: then I will send, and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> you from there <S%H4100>why<s%> should I be <S%H7921>deprived<s%> also of you <S%H8147>both<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>?

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, I am <S%H6973>weary<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>: if <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%>, such as these which are of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, what <S%H4100>good<s%> shall my life do <S%H2416>me<s%>?
